name: Titanium.UI.iOS.ApplicationShortcuts
summary: The Home screen quick actions API is for adding shortcuts to your app icon that anticipate and accelerate a user's interaction with your app.

methods.name: addDynamicShortcut
methods.summary: Creates a new dynamic application shortcut item.

parameters.name: params
parameters.summary: The parameters used when creating a dynamic shortcut.

methods.name: dynamicShortcutExists
methods.summary: Returns true or false depending if the provided shortcut object already exists.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.summary: Checks if the dynamic application shortcut item identified by the identifier exists.

methods.name: getDynamicShortcut
methods.summary: Gets the dynamic application shortcut item identified by the identifier.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.summary: Use the identifier argument to determine which shortcut should be returned.

methods.name: listDynamicShortcuts
methods.summary: Returns an array of the application shortcuts created dynamically.

methods.name: listStaticShortcuts
methods.summary: Returns an array of the application shortcuts listed in your tiapp.xml file.

methods.name: removeDynamicShortcut
methods.summary: Removes the dynamic application shortcut item identified by the identifier.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.summary: Use the identifier argument to determine which shortcut should be removed.
